AddIndent.summary: Changes the IndentCount by the provided value.

AddLine.summary: Adds a text line without modification.

Item.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item and adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.
Item.returns: The potentially indented, delimited and wrapped new text value.

Line.summary: Adds a modified text line to the builder.
Line.returns: The potentially indented and wrapped new text value.

GetDelimited.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item.
GetDelimited.returns: The potentially indented and delimited new text value.

GetIndented.summary: Gets a new potentially indented line.
GetIndented.returns: The potentially indented new text value.

GetLine.returns: The potentially indented and wrapped new text value.
